'''Gambler's Pocket Watch''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Gambler]].

==Description==
Perfect timing is necessary for the gambler's trick to work.<br />That's why she always had this golden pocket watch in her breast pocket.<br />In countless games, there was always that crucial moment when her sensitive perception of time saved her.
